assignments.description: Counts Commissionable ECs Adds EC's Name to a text formula to be used in display later Grabs the user of id of the user in the Employee field and adds to a text collection variable to be compared with BDs later

assignments.label: Various Assignments for Commissionable ECs

fields.name: SelectBDsMessage
fields.fieldText: Please make changes to the BDs and then click Update Job:

fields.name: NoBdMessage
fields.fieldText: Please note: You may only select people who are active and are marked as commissionable. If you need to add someone else, please email commission@firstonsite.com.

fields.name: SalesOPsBDChnage
fields.fieldText: Please make changes to the BDs and then click Update Job:

fields.name: FlowFaultMessage
fields.fieldText:
Please read the error below. Play close attention to the error after the phrase FIELD_CUSTOM_VALIDATION_EXCEPTION


{!$Flow.FaultMessage}


To fix the errors, click the previous button to go back into the field(s) that need attention. Then, click the Next button to complete the creation of the job.


Thank you!

fields.name: SalesOpsFaultMessage
fields.fieldText:
Please read the error below. Play close attention to the error after the phrase FIELD_CUSTOM_VALIDATION_EXCEPTION


{!$Flow.FaultMessage}


To fix the errors, click the previous button to go back into the field(s) that need attention. Then, click the Next button to complete the creation of the job.


Thank you!

fields.name: JobCommissionCommEmployeesOver3Message
fields.fieldText:
You are not able to modify the BDs on this Job.

There are more than three Employee Commissions records on this Job. Please email commission@firstonsite.com to request an additional exception and include the following details:

fields.name: JobCommissionCommEmployeesOver3MessageDetail
fields.fieldText:
..

Commissionable Employees: {!varT_CommissionableEmployees}

...

Job Number: {!getJob.WorkOrderNumber}

Branch: {!getJob.Branch_Name_Text__c}

Job Name: {!getJob.Job_Name__c}

Account: {!getJob.Account_Name__c}

Property: {!getJob.Property__r.Name}

Job Status: {!getJob.Status}

Start Date: {!getJob.Start_Date__c}

Work Complete Date: {!getJob.Work_Complete_Date__c}

ROM Contracted Sales: ${!getJob.ROM_Contracted_Sales__c}

fields.name: JobCommissionCustomSplitsMessage
fields.fieldText:
You are not able to modify the BDs on this Job.

There are Custom Splits on this Job. Please email commission@firstonsite.com to request an additional exception and include the following details:

fields.name: JobCommissionCustomSplitsMEssageDetails
fields.fieldText:
...

Custom Splits?: {!getJobCommission.Custom_Splits__c}

...

Job Number: {!getJob.WorkOrderNumber}

Branch: {!getJob.Branch_Name_Text__c}

Job Name: {!getJob.Job_Name__c}

Account: {!getJob.Account_Name__c}

Property: {!getJob.Property__r.Name}

Job Status: {!getJob.Status}

Start Date: {!getJob.Start_Date__c}

Work Complete Date: {!getJob.Work_Complete_Date__c}

ROM Contracted Sales: ${!getJob.ROM_Contracted_Sales__c}

fields.name: JobCommissionExceptionMessage
fields.fieldText:
You are not able to modify the BDs on this Job.

The Job's current BDs do not match the current Employee Commission records. Please email commission@firstonsite.com to request an additional exception and include the following details:

fields.name: JobCommissionExceptionMessageDetail
fields.fieldText:
...

BDs on Job: {!getJob.BD_Concat__c}

Employee Commission records: {!varT_CommissionableEmployees}

...

Job Number: {!getJob.WorkOrderNumber}

Branch: {!getJob.Branch_Name_Text__c}

Job Name: {!getJob.Job_Name__c}

Account: {!getJob.Account_Name__c}

Property: {!getJob.Property__r.Name}

Job Status: {!getJob.Status}

Start Date: {!getJob.Start_Date__c}

Work Complete Date: {!getJob.Work_Complete_Date__c}

ROM Contracted Sales: ${!getJob.ROM_Contracted_Sales__c}

fields.name: JobCommissionNonCommEmployeesMessage
fields.fieldText:
You are not able to modify the BDs on this Job.

There are one or more noncommissionable employees with Employee Commissions records on this Job. Please email commission@firstonsite.com to request an additional exception and include the following details:

fields.name: JobCommissionNonCommEmployeesMessageDetail
fields.fieldText:
...

Non-Commissionable Employees: {!varT_NonCommissionableEmployees}

...

Job Number: {!getJob.WorkOrderNumber}

Branch: {!getJob.Branch_Name_Text__c}

Job Name: {!getJob.Job_Name__c}

Account: {!getJob.Account_Name__c}

Property: {!getJob.Property__r.Name}

Job Status: {!getJob.Status}

Start Date: {!getJob.Start_Date__c}

Work Complete Date: {!getJob.Work_Complete_Date__c}

ROM Contracted Sales: ${!getJob.ROM_Contracted_Sales__c}

fields.name: JobCommissionNotOpenMessage
fields.fieldText:
You are not able to modify the BDs on this Job.

The Commission Status is {!getJobCommission.Commission_Status__c}. Please email commission@firstonsite.com to request an exception and include the following details:

fields.name: JobCommissionStatusMessageDetail
fields.fieldText:
...

Commission Status: {!getJobCommission.Commission_Status__c}

...

Job Number: {!getJob.WorkOrderNumber}

Branch: {!getJob.Branch_Name_Text__c}

Job Name: {!getJob.Job_Name__c}

Account: {!getJob.Account_Name__c}

Property: {!getJob.Property__r.Name}

Job Status: {!getJob.Status}

Start Date: {!getJob.Start_Date__c}

Work Complete Date: {!getJob.Work_Complete_Date__c}

ROM Contracted Sales: ${!getJob.ROM_Contracted_Sales__c}

fields.name: JobCommissionPaidMessage
fields.fieldText:
You are not able to modify the BDs on this Job.

There are one or more Employee Commissions records already Paid on this Job. Please email commission@firstonsite.com to request an additional exception and include the following details:

fields.name: JobCommissionPaidMessageDetail
fields.fieldText:
...

Employee Commissions Paid: {!varT_PaidEmployees}

...

Job Number: {!getJob.WorkOrderNumber}

Branch: {!getJob.Branch_Name_Text__c}

Job Name: {!getJob.Job_Name__c}

Account: {!getJob.Account_Name__c}

Property: {!getJob.Property__r.Name}

Job Status: {!getJob.Status}

Start Date: {!getJob.Start_Date__c}

Work Complete Date: {!getJob.Work_Complete_Date__c}

ROM Contracted Sales: ${!getJob.ROM_Contracted_Sales__c}
